cast.overview: Hollywood, 1927: As silent movie star George Valentin wonders if the arrival of talking pictures will cause him to fade into oblivion, he sparks with Peppy Miller, a young dancer set for a big break.
cast.title: The Artist

details.biography: Robert Amico (October 1, 1953, in Brooklyn, New York, USA) is an American actor, producer, writer, and director. He began his career on the theater stage in New York City and was influenced by the Actors Studio and the acting technique The Method. Amico appeared in films such as 8mm (1999), Ford v Ferrari (2019), and I Am Doctor Chastain (2019). In addition to his work as an actor, he is also active as a producer and director and teaches acting at the Whitmore Lindley Theatre in North Hollywood. He was a member of the Screen Actors Guild and the Academy of Television Arts and Sciences and was involved in the Los Angeles County Federation of Labor AFL/CIO.
details.name: Robert Amico
details.place_of_birth: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
